titles: A declaration of his excellency, George Lord Goring Earl of Norwich with the gentry and freeholders of the county of Essex, in armes for the prosecution and just defense of their generall petition, and solemne ingagement, and their offer unto all such officers and souldiers as shall repair unto them.
author: Norwich, George Goring, Earl of, 1583?-1663.
notes: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
